name: Jean Lowe Vibe
notes: Top notes are Black Currant, Coriander, Mint, Citron, Lemon and Orange; middle notes are Carrot Seeds, May Rose, Apricot and Basil; base notes are Fig, Ambrette and Dates.

name: XJ 1861 Naxos
notes: Top notes are Lavender, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Honey, Cinnamon, Cashmeran and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Tobacco Leaf, Vanilla and Tonka Bean.
